title: GTAlign: Game-Theoretic Alignment of LLM Assistants for Mutual Welfare
description: Proposed a game-theoretic framework modeling user-AI interaction as a cooperative game to align LLM assistants with user preferences for mutual welfare.

title: The Challenge of Teaching Reasoning to LLMs Without RL or Distillation
description: Explored minimal fine-tuning approaches for inducing chain-of-thought reasoning in base language models. Selected as a reviewer for the workshop.

title: Median of Means Sampling for the Keister Function
venue: Submitted to International Monte Carlo Conference 2026
description: Investigated the performance of median-of-means sampling for computing the Keister function integral, demonstrating improved robustness.
